name: Deviller Environmental Risk Assessment of Chemicals
goal: DERAC is a scientific consultancy dedicated to Environmental Risk Assessment of Chemicals linking research and regulatory worlds. Founded by Dr Geneviève Deviller in 2016 after 20 years of professional experience in the service of research institutions, regulatory bodies and industry, DERAC has an unique and independent expertise in this field offering a range of high-quality services to customers from both the public and private sectors. These include performing studies in ecotoxicity, environmental fate&behaviour and physico-chemistry, preparation of registration dossiers and their defence, modeling hazard (QSAR) and exposure, scientific representation with customers and the authorities, research funding support and scientific partnership, development of methods to assess risk and also training where required.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: REACH, CLP, Biocides (BPR); Water Framework Directive; Marine Strategy Framework Directive; Horizon 2020; Alternatives to animal testing and safety assessment of chemicals; Risk assessment of mixtures; Air quality; Soil protection; Environmental monitoring; Climate change impact; Ecosystems and biodiversity; Sustainable production: Best available techniques (BREF); Waste and circular economy; Proposal for a Regulation on minimum requirements for water reuse
